info.title: API documentation for team project QuizMaster
info.description:
API documentation for QuizMaster backend [GitHub repository](https://github.com/AsphaltHedgehog/Banana-Plant)  


This application serves as a platform for creating and taking quizzes, offering an interactive space for users to assess their knowledge.

The project provides for the possibility of user registration, authentication and authorization. Users can create and pass and delete tests, filter them by category, view statistics and reviews.

The application has a friendly and clear user interface that allows you to conveniently and quickly perform all the necessary actions.

The project also ensures user security through password encryption and token-based identification.

## Key Features:

**User Registration and Authentication:** Securely manage user access and identification through registration and authentication processes.    
**Quiz Management:** Create and delete quizzes  
**Diverse Question Types:** Multiple Choice, True/False, etc.  
**Quiz Taking:** Participants receive immediate scoring and have the option to leave feedback.  


## Technology Stack:

**Node.js:** JavaScript runtime environment on the server  
**Express.js:** Framework for building web applications on Node.js  
**MongoDB:** NoSQL database for storing quiz data  
**Mongoose:** Library for interfacing with MongoDB in Node.js  
**React.js:** Front-end library for creating user interfaces  
**Redux:** State management library for React applications

post.description: Register a new user account with the provided name, email, and password.

requestBody.description:
### Description of request parameters:

**name** - string, user name.

**email** - string, user email. 

**password** - string, user password.

201.description: Successful registration. Returns the registered user's name, email and avatarURL automatically generated using Gravatar

400.description: Bad Request. Invalid or missing request parameters.

409.description: Conflict. User with such email already exists

post.description: Authenticate an existing user using their email and password.

requestBody.description:
### Description of request parameters:

**email** - string, user email. 

**password** - string, encrypted user password.

200.description: Successful authentication and generation of authentication token. Returns an authentication token. Token is used to store the user's authorization state in the system, allowing users to make secure API requests. The token is a string of characters and is generated at each new user authorization.

400.description: Bad Request. Invalid or missing request parameters.

patch.description: Logs out the authenticated user by clearing the token associated with their session.

400.description: Bad Request. Invalid or missing request parameters.

401.description: Unauthorized. Bearer auth failed - invalid token.

post.description: Resets the password for the user account and sends an email for password reset.

requestBody.description: Email address of the user requesting a password reset

message.description: Status message indicating the success of the password reset request.
Error message indicating that the account associated with the provided email was not found.

patch.summary: Set a new password for the user's account.
patch.description: Set a new password using the reset token received via email.

parameters.name: token
parameters.description: The unique token received in the password reset link.

400.description: Bad Request. New password is required

patch.description: Update information about the authenticated user.

name.description: The new name of the user.

patch.description: Uploads a new avatar image for the user and updates the avatar URL in the user profile.

201.description: Successful operation. Avatar URL updated successfully.

patch.description: Adds or removes a favorite quiz for the authenticated user.

favoriteID.description: The ID of the quiz to add or remove from favorites.

message.description: Message indicating the success of the operation.

400.description: Bad Request. The request body is invalid.

parameters.name: page

parameters.name: pageSize

200.description: Successful operation. Returns a list of quizzes.

post.description: Create a new quiz with specified theme, age group, categories, and background information.

ageGroup.description: The age group for which the quiz is intended.

category.description: List of category IDs associated with the quiz.

ageGroup.description: The age group for which the quiz is intended.

category.description: List of category IDs associated with the quiz.

get.summary: Get all quizzes sorted by rating.

200.description: A list of quizzes sorted by rating.

get.description: Retrieve a list of all quiz categories

Retrieve quizzes based on specified filters.

Optionally provide additional filters:
- `ageGroup` specifies the age group for which quizzes are requested
- `page` and `pageSize` for pagination.
- `rating` to filter quizzes by maximum rating.
- `finished` to filter quizzes by maximum number of finished attempts.
- `title` to filter quizzes by category titles. This can be a single string or an array of strings.
- `favorites` to filter quizzes by favorite IDs.

The response contains a list of quizzes matching the specified criteria.

parameters.name: ageGroup
parameters.description: Age group for filtering quizzes

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Page number for pagination

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: Number of items per page for pagination

parameters.name: rating
parameters.description: Maximum rating for filtering quizzes

parameters.name: finished
parameters.description: Maximum finished count for filtering quizzes

parameters.name: title
parameters.description: Title of the category to filter quizzes by

parameters.name: favorites
parameters.description: Array of favorite quiz IDs
